title: Choose Glass Over Plastic
description: Glass containers can be recycled infinitely without quality loss, unlike plastic which degrades and often ends up in landfills.

title: Look for Recycled Content
description: Products with recycled materials reduce the need for virgin resources and save significant energy in manufacturing processes.

title: Support Local Brands
description: Local products have lower transportation emissions and often have better transparency in their sustainability practices.

title: Avoid Single-Use Plastics
description: Bring your own reusable bags, bottles, and containers to significantly reduce plastic waste in your daily life.

title: Check Product Certifications
description: Look for certifications like Fair Trade, Organic, or B Corp that indicate better environmental and social practices.
